com.illcode.meterman.ui

Interface SoundManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TinySoundManager

    public interface SoundManager

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearAudio()
      Unload all sound and music.
      void dispose()
      Dispose of resources allocated during initialization, and stop any extra threads.
      boolean finishedProcessing()
      Returns true if all pending load and play commands have been processed by the soundThread.
      void init()
      Initialize the sound manager, starting any threads it may use.
      boolean isMusicEnabled()
      Returns true if the playing of music is enabled.
      boolean isSoundEnabled()
      Returns true if the playing of sounds is enabled.
      void loadMusic(String name, Path p)
      Loads music from a file
      void loadSound(String name, Path p)
      Loads a Sound from a file
      void pauseAllMusic()
      Pauses all music currently playing.
      void playMusic(String name, boolean loop, double volume)
      Plays music previously loaded.
      void playSound(String name, double volume)
      Plays a sound previously loaded.
      void resumeAllMusic()
      Resumes playing all music that was previously paused by a call to pauseAllMusic().
      void setGlobalVolume(double volume)
      Set a global volume multiplier.
      void setMusicEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Enables or disables the playing of music
      void setSoundEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Enables or disables the playing of sounds
      void stopMusic(String name)
      Stops playback for music previously loaded.
      void unloadMusic(String name)
      Unloads Music previously loaded by this SoundManager
      void unloadSound(String name)
      Unloads a Sound previously loaded by this SoundManager

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init()
        Initialize the sound manager, starting any threads it may use.

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Dispose of resources allocated during initialization, and stop any extra threads.

      • clearAudio

        void clearAudio()
        Unload all sound and music.

      • setGlobalVolume

        void setGlobalVolume(double volume)
        Set a global volume multiplier.
        Parameters:
        volume - global volume multiplier (nominal is 1.0)

      • setMusicEnabled

        void setMusicEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enables or disables the playing of music
        Parameters:
        enabled - true if music should be enabled

      • isMusicEnabled

        boolean isMusicEnabled()
        Returns true if the playing of music is enabled.

      • loadMusic

        void loadMusic(String name,
             Path p)
        Loads music from a file
        Parameters:
        name - the name by which the music will be referred by this SoundManager
        p - the Path to load music from

      • playMusic

        void playMusic(String name,
             boolean loop,
             double volume)
        Plays music previously loaded.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the Music, as specified in loadMusic(java.lang.String, java.nio.file.Path)
        volume - the relative volume at which to play the music (1.0 is nominal)

      • stopMusic

        void stopMusic(String name)
        Stops playback for music previously loaded.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the Music, as specified in loadMusic(java.lang.String, java.nio.file.Path)

      • pauseAllMusic

        void pauseAllMusic()
        Pauses all music currently playing.

      • resumeAllMusic

        void resumeAllMusic()
        Resumes playing all music that was previously paused by a call to pauseAllMusic().

      • setSoundEnabled

        void setSoundEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enables or disables the playing of sounds
        Parameters:
        enabled - true if sounds should be enabled

      • isSoundEnabled

        boolean isSoundEnabled()
        Returns true if the playing of sounds is enabled.

      • unloadMusic

        void unloadMusic(String name)
        Unloads Music previously loaded by this SoundManager
        Parameters:
        name - the name under which the audio was loaded

      • loadSound

        void loadSound(String name,
             Path p)
        Loads a Sound from a file
        Parameters:
        name - the name by which the sound will be referred by this SoundManager
        p - the Path to load sound from

      • playSound

        void playSound(String name,
             double volume)
        Plays a sound previously loaded.

        Note that if any music loads are pending, the sound won't be played, because it may not play quickly and so many appear desynchronized with the visuals.

        Parameters:
        name - name of the sound, as specified in loadSound(java.lang.String, java.nio.file.Path)
        volume - the relative volume at which to play the sound (1.0 is nominal)

      • unloadSound

        void unloadSound(String name)
        Unloads a Sound previously loaded by this SoundManager
        Parameters:
        name - the name under which the audio was loaded

      • finishedProcessing

        boolean finishedProcessing()
        Returns true if all pending load and play commands have been processed by the soundThread.
